description: When failing to connect to a data store, Nova doesn't log which data store it tried to connect to.  This makes it unnecessarily hard to debug the problem.
title: When failing to connect to a data store, Nova doesn't log which data store it tried to connect to

comments.content: When failing to connect to a data store, Nova doesn't log which data store it tried to connect to.  This makes it unnecessarily hard to debug the problem.
